description.brazilian: Alimente Blob com cada uma das jujubas
description.english: Feed Blob one of each of the jelly beans
description.french: Donner un bonbon de chaque type au blob
description.german: Füttere Blob mit je einer von allen Geleebohnen
description.polish: Nakarm Bloba po jednej z każdego rodzaju żelek
description.russian: Скормить блобу по одной желейке каждого вида
description.spanish: Dale a Blob una gominola de cada

description.brazilian: Transforme-se em robô pela primeira vez
description.english: Turn into a mech for the first time
description.french: Le transformer en mécha pour la première fois
description.german: Verwandele dich zum ersten Mal in einen Mech
description.polish: Po raz pierwszy zamień się w mecha
description.russian: Превратиться в меха в первый раз
description.spanish: Conviértete en un mecha por primera vez

description.brazilian: Abrace a bolha 5 vezes
description.english: Hug the blob 5 times
description.french: Enlacer le blob 5 fois
description.german: Umarme den Blob 5 Mal
description.polish: 5 razy przytul Bloba
description.russian: Обнять блоба 5 раз
description.spanish: Abraza al blob 5 veces
